method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new abstraction and adds it to the collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns an abstraction using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes an abstraction using its index or its name from the collection.

class.name: SimBehaviors
class.abstract: Represents the collection of simulation behaviors.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new behavior and adds it to the collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a behavior using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a behavior using its index or its name from the collection.

class.name: SimFemRoot
class.abstract: Represents the root feature of the FEM Representation.

method.name: AddAssociatedRep
method.abstract: Associates a representation to the FEM Representation.

method.name: AddChild
method.abstract: Adds a child FEM Rep.

method.name: ExcludePropertyConnection
method.abstract: Excludes the connection proporty and deletes the connection mesh part in the FEM representation of the given product.

method.name: GetNumberingOffsetValue
method.abstract: Retrieves numbering offset value of a child FEM representation.

method.name: GetSet
method.abstract: Retrieves or creates a set from its type.

method.name: IncludePropertyConnection
method.abstract: Includes the connection property and creates the connection mesh part in the FEM representation of the given product.

method.name: IsIncludedPropertyConnection
method.abstract: Tests whether a connection property is included in the FEM representation or not.

method.name: RemoveAssociatedRep
method.abstract: Removes a representation to the FEM Representation.

method.name: RemoveChild
method.abstract: Removes a child FEM Rep.

method.name: RemoveNumbering
method.abstract: Removes numbering specification.

method.name: SetNumberingOffsetValue
method.abstract: Sets numbering offset value to a child FEM representation.

method.name: Update
method.abstract: Launches the update of a FEM root.

method.name: HasAnAssociatedRep
method.abstract: Retrieves the flag that determines if the FEM root has an associated representation or not.

method.name: Parameters
method.abstract: Returns the collection containing the FEM Representation parameters.

method.name: Relations
method.abstract: Returns the collection containing the FEM Representation relations.

method.name: UpdateStatus
method.abstract: Returns the Update Status of a FEM root.

class.name: SimGroup
class.abstract: Represents a simulation group.

method.name: AddBoundary
method.abstract: Creates a new boundary and add it into the boundary description of the simulation group.

method.name: GetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the value corresponding to the given attribute.

method.name: RemoveBoundary
method.abstract: Removes a boundary to the boundary description of the simulation group.

method.name: RemoveNumbering
method.abstract: Removes numbering specification.

method.name: SetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Sets the value corresponding to the given attribute.

method.name: SetGroupType
method.abstract: Sets the type of the simulation group.

class.name: SimGroups
class.abstract: Represents the collection of Simulation Groups.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new group and adds it to the collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a group using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a group using its index or its name from the collection.

class.name: SimImportExportArgs
class.abstract: Represents the arguments used to import/export data to/from a SIM manager.

method.name: SetPath
method.abstract: Sets the path from/to which data is imported/exported.

method.name: SetUnits
method.abstract: Sets the units of the base magnitudes (length, mass, time, .

method.name: Parameters
method.abstract: Gets the parameters of the import/export operation.

class.name: SimLinkAccess
class.abstract: Represents the service to manage the feature links.

method.name: AddLink
method.abstract: Adds a link.

method.name: RemoveAllLinks
method.abstract: Removes all links.

method.name: RemoveLink
method.abstract: Removes a link.

class.name: SimMCXProperties
class.abstract: Represents the collection of MCX properties.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new MCX property and adds it to the collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a MCX property using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a MCX Property using its index or its name from the collection.

class.name: SimManagerSIMExport
class.abstract: Represents the service to export data from a SIM manager.

method.name: Export
method.abstract: Exports data from this SIM manager thanks to a given SIM exporter (identified by its id) using the current export arguments.

method.name: Args
method.abstract: Gets the current arguments of the export operation.

class.name: SimManagerSIMImport
class.abstract: Represents the service to import data into a SIM manager.

method.name: Import
method.abstract: Imports data into this SIM manager thanks to a given SIM importer (identified by its id) using the current import arguments.

method.name: Args
method.abstract: Gets the current arguments of the import operation.

class.name: SimMeshElement
class.abstract: Represents a Selected Element.

class.name: SimMeshNode
class.abstract: Represents a Selected Node.

class.name: SimMeshPart
class.abstract: Represents a Mesh Part.

method.name: AddSupport
method.abstract: Creates a new support and add it to the support description of the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the value corresponding to the given attribute.

method.name: GetGroups
method.abstract: Returns the group collection from the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetMeshSpecifications
method.abstract: Returns the local mesh specification collection from the Mesh Part.

method.name: GetTopologySpecifications
method.abstract: Returns the local topology specification collection from the Mesh Part.

method.name: RemoveExternalReference
method.abstract: Removes an external reference corresponding to the given parameter.

method.name: RemoveNumbering
method.abstract: Removes numbering specification.

method.name: RemoveSupport
method.abstract: Removes a support to the support description of the Mesh Part.

method.name: SetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Sets the value corresponding to the given parameter.

method.name: SetExternalReference
method.abstract: Creates an external reference corresponding to the given parameter.

method.name: SetMeshPartsToCapture
method.abstract: Sets the list of candidate Mesh Parts for capture.

method.name: SetRule
method.abstract: Sets the Mesh Part rule.

method.name: Update
method.abstract: Launches the update of a Mesh Part.

method.name: Activity
method.abstract: Returns the activity of an Mesh Part.

method.name: UpdateStatus
method.abstract: Returns the Update Status of a meshpart.

class.name: SimMeshParts
class.abstract: Represents the collection of simulation Mesh Parts.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new Mesh Part and adds it to the collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Mesh Part using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a Mesh Part using its index or its name from the collection.

class.name: SimMeshSet
class.abstract: Represents a Mesh Set.

method.name: Update
method.abstract: Launches the update of all the Mesh Parts contained by the Mesh Set.

method.name: MeshParts
method.abstract: Returns the Mesh Part collection from the current Mesh Set.

class.name: SimMeshSpecification
class.abstract: Represents a Local Mesh Specification.

method.name: GetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the value corresponding to the given attribute.

method.name: SetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Sets the value corresponding to the given attribute.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns the type of the Local Mesh Specification.

class.name: SimMeshSpecifications
class.abstract: Represents the collection of Local Mesh Specifications.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new Local Mesh Specification and adds it to the collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Local Mesh Specification using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a Local Mesh Specification using its index or its name from the collection.

class.name: SimNumbering
class.abstract: Represents a numbering specification.

method.name: GetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the value corresponding to the given attribute.

method.name: SetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Sets the value corresponding to the given attribute.

class.name: SimParameterSet
class.abstract: Represents a string-keyed set of parameters of varying type.

method.name: GetDoubleArrayParameter
method.abstract: Gets the values of a parameter which is a list of reals.

method.name: GetDoubleParameter
method.abstract: Gets the value of a parameter which is a single real.

method.name: GetIntegerArrayParameter
method.abstract: Gets the values of a parameter which is a list of integers.

method.name: GetIntegerParameter
method.abstract: Gets the value of a parameter which is a single integer.

method.name: GetObjectArrayParameter
method.abstract: Gets the values of a parameter which is a list of objects.

method.name: GetObjectParameter
method.abstract: Gets the value of a parameter which is a single object.

method.name: GetStringArrayParameter
method.abstract: Gets the values of a parameter which is a list of strings.

method.name: GetStringParameter
method.abstract: Gets the value of a parameter which is a single string.

method.name: SetDoubleArrayParameter
method.abstract: Sets the values of a parameter which is a list of reals.

method.name: SetDoubleParameter
method.abstract: Sets the value of a parameter which is a single real.

method.name: SetIntegerArrayParameter
method.abstract: Sets the values of a parameter which is a list of integers.

method.name: SetIntegerParameter
method.abstract: Sets the value of a parameter which is a single integer.

method.name: SetObjectArrayParameter
method.abstract: Sets the values of a parameter which is a list of objects.

method.name: SetObjectParameter
method.abstract: Sets the value of a parameter which is a single object.

method.name: SetStringArrayParameter
method.abstract: Sets the values of a parameter which is a list of strings.

method.name: SetStringParameter
method.abstract: Sets the value of a parameter which is a single string.

class.name: SimPrdRepFactory
class.abstract: Represents the service to create simulation product representations.

method.name: CreatePrdRep
method.abstract: Creates a simulation product representation.

class.name: SimProperties
class.abstract: Represents the collection of simulation properties.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new property and adds it to the collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a property using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a property using its index or its name from the property collection.

class.name: SimRepServices
class.abstract: Represents the service associated to the representation instance.

method.name: IsLoaded
method.abstract: Asks if the representation reference is loaded or not.

method.name: LoadRep
method.abstract: Loads a Representation Reference in Design mode.

class.name: SimResultRepManager
class.abstract: Represents the Result Rep Manager.

method.name: ScenarioResults
method.abstract: Retrieves the collection of all scenario results.

class.name: SimScenarioResults
class.abstract: Represents the collection of Scenario Results.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a scenario result using its index from the scenario result collection.

class.name: SimSeamWeld
class.abstract: Represents a Seam Weld Local Specification.

method.name: AddAllCompatibleFastenersAsSupports
method.abstract: Retrieves all the compatible line fasteners from the Mesh Part support and adds them as Seam Weld Local Specification support.

class.name: SimSpecsRepManager
class.abstract: Interface representing Specifications Rep Manager.

class.name: SimTopologySpecification
class.abstract: Represents a Local Topology Specification.

method.name: GetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the value corresponding to the given attribute.

method.name: SetAttributeValue
method.abstract: Sets the value corresponding to the given attribute.

method.name: Type
method.abstract: Returns the type of the Local Topology Specification.

class.name: SimTopologySpecifications
class.abstract: Represents the collection of Local Topology Specifications.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new Local Topology Specification and adds it to the Local Topology Specification collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Local Topology Specification using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a Local Topology Specification using its index or its name from the collection.

class.name: SimVisualization
class.abstract: Represents the collection of Visualization Features.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Creates a new Visualization Feature and adds it to the collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a Vizualiation Feature using its index or its name from the collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a Vizualiation Feature using its index or its name from the collection.

class.name: SimXRep
class.abstract: Represents a XRep.

method.name: AddRelation
method.abstract: Adds a relation to the XRep.

method.name: ExportFile
method.abstract: Exports the data of the XRep to a data file.

method.name: ImportFile
method.abstract: Imports a data file in the XRep.

method.name: RemoveRelation
method.abstract: Removes a relation from the XRep.

method.name: FileName
method.abstract: Sets or retrieves the data file name associated to the XRep.
